name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Venmo
description: This is a repository of venmo APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Venmo
apis.description: Venmo is a free digital wallet that lets you make and share payments with friends. You can easily split the bill, cab fare, or much more. Download the iOS or Android app or sign up on Venmo.com today.
